
{{alias}}( [namespace] )
    Returns a list of standard library aliases.

    Parameters
    ----------
    namespace: string (optional)
        Namespace filter.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array<string>
        List of aliases.

    Examples
    --------
    > var o = {{alias}}()
    [...]
    > o = {{alias}}( '@stdlib/math/base/special' )

    See Also
    --------
